Module com.example.anti_cafe
Package com.example.anti_cafe

Class TableSelectionWindow

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.example.anti_cafe.MainWindow
com.example.anti_cafe.TableSelectionWindow
public class TableSelectionWindow extends MainWindow
Class for a table selector window that allows the user to select a table to use and manages table statuses.

    • ensureTableIsAvailable

      private static void ensureTableIsAvailable​(int tableIndex) throws TableOccupiedException
      Checks if the table is occupied. Throws an exception if the table is occupied.
      Parameters:
      tableIndex - index of the table to check
      Throws:
      TableOccupiedException - if the table is occupied
